duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in direct patient care by providing basic physical care to promote patient comfort as directed by the Registered Nurse.
Transport patients to all tests and procedures, as well as escort patients for discharge, following safe patient handling policies.
Perform routine phlebotomy services and vital sign measurements according to departmental policy.
Assist with basic rehab/Physical Therapy activities, such as active and passive range of motion and ambulation.
Maintain a clean and safe environment to help prevent and/or control infections and to provide for the safety of patients and employees.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Basic Life Support or HeartSaver First Aid within 30 days of hire date
